import React, {Component} from 'react'; import Service from '../../service/service' import './randomFilm.css' export default class RandomFilm extends Component{ state = { image: null, title: null, popularity: null, runtime: null, overview: null } render(){ const{image,title,popularity,runtime,overview}=this.state return(

{title}

  • Popularity: {popularity}
  • Run Time: {runtime}
  • Overview: {overview}
) } }
